content: thinking as distinctive characteristic (Auszeichnung) of man, belonging together that concerns man & Being [Being needs man]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

linkedContent: thinking as distinctive characteristic (Auszeichnung) of man, belonging together that concerns man & Being [Being needs man]

content: man obviously (offenbar) is a being [presumption of beings], so he belongs to totality (Ganze) of Being, to be in the order (eingeordnet) of Being > man is unique: being who thinks, open to Being, face to face w/ Being, referred to being, answers to it > man is essentially this relationship (Bezug) of responding (Entsprechung) to Being, he is only this > this “only (nur)” is not a limitation (Beschränkung), is an excess (Übermass) [surplus] > man lets Being arrive as presence, such becoming present needs (braucht) openness of a clearing, and by this need (Brauchen) remains appropriated (übereignet) to human being [Being needs man]

content: the frame (Ge-stell) as a 2nd forgetting [?], prevents even Being of beings as presence > w/in Ge-stell must experience (erfahren) strange ownership/appropriation in which man & Being are delivered over to each other, must enter into Ereignis (event of appropriation), the word Ereignis [“the words” in English translation] should speak as a key term in service of thinking [via dissemination, Derrida deconstructs “key”] > Ereignis as singulare tantum, happens only in singular, not in any number, uniquely (einzig)

content: Das Ereignis als Er-eignis denken, heisst, am Bau dieses in sich schwingenden Bereiches bauen (to think appropriation as Ereignis means to contribute to this self-vibrating realm), a self-suspended structure (in sich schwebenden Bau) > thinking receives tools for this from language (Sprache), the most delicate, most susceptible vibration that holds everything w/in suspended structure of the Ereignis

content: Spinoza appeals to whole thinking of German Idealism & provokes its contradiction: lets thinking begin w/ absolute
linkedContent: Spinoza appeals to whole thinking of German Idealism & provokes its contradiction: lets thinking begin w/ absolute

content: [obsession w/ thought] [inheritance, cf. p. 41, method] essential past still preserved, prevails throughout (durchwaltet) tradition in originary way, always in being in advance of it, yet never “expressly thought in its own right” as the Originary (Anfangende) [compare to Derrida’s Absolute Past]

content: the oblivion (Vergessenheit) of difference: what gives us thought [?]: the veiling (Verhüllung) of difference as such has withdrawn itself from the beginning (sich anfänglich entzogen hat): oblivion belongs to the difference because difference belongs to the oblivion [cf. differance]

content: [method] step back goes from what is unthought (the difference as such) into what gives us thought (das zu-Denkende) > difference btwn Being & beings, a problem unasked in tradition, but tentatively (vorläufig) [provisional], unavoidably (unvermeidlich), we speak in language of tradition

content: if science must begin w/ God, it is the science of God: theology, theologia (mytho-poetic utterances about gods w/out reference to creed or ecclesiastical doctrine) > why is science, which, since Fichte, is name for metaphysics, theology? > theology tied to ontology, question of beings as such and as a whole: wholeness of this whole, unity of all beings that unifies as generative ground [causa sui?]

content: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]

content: must always think Being in difference w/ beings, & beings in difference w/ Being > difference not a representation added to Being & beings
linkedContent: must always think Being in difference w/ beings, & beings in difference w/ Being > difference not a representation added to Being & beings

content: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance
linkedContent: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance

content: Being & beings are always found to be already there by virtue of & w/in the difference [so close to Derrida, differance, save the “the”] > where does “btwn” come from into which difference is to be inserted? [too representative?]

content: thing called difference: we encounter it everywhere, encounter it so unquestioningly, we don’t notice encounter itself

linkedContent: thing called difference: we encounter it everywhere, encounter it so unquestioningly, we don’t notice encounter itself

content: now difference becomes Being of beings [how?] > Being that is beings where “is” speaks transitively, in transition > Being transits over (that) which arrives: arrival (Ankunft) means: “to keep concealed in unconcealedness—to abide present in this keeping—to be a being”

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: differentiation alone holds apart “btwn” of overwhelming/arrival [ontological difference so close to spacing, but still knows what borders it?]
linkedContent: differentiation alone holds apart “btwn” of overwhelming/arrival [ontological difference so close to spacing, but still knows what borders it?]

content: rigorous thinking, one step back: Being thought in terms of the difference [need another step back? to get to Derrida?]
linkedContent: rigorous thinking, one step back: Being thought in terms of the difference [need another step back? to get to Derrida?]

content: Being as unconcealing overwhelming (enterbergenden überkommnis), beings in sense of arrival (Ankunft): are present, thus differentiated, by virtue of the Same, the differentiation > “the difference of Being & beings, as the differentiation of overwhelming & arrival, is the perdurance (Austrag) of the 2 in the unconcealing keeping in concealment” > being apart & toward each other of overwhelming/arrival: clearing of what veils & closes itself off

content: no example in beings of active nature of Being, nature of Being is itself unprecedented exemplar [wouldn’t this exemplariness of Being take it beyond Being?]

content: out of oblivion of difference as such to think difference as perdurance of unconcealing overcoming & self-keeping arrival [why? why would spacing say something about Being’s destiny, its all-pervasiveness] > Being’s possible all-pervasiveness not universal, not a law guaranteeing a dialectical process

content: how did difference as perdurance (Austrag) remain concealed in the history of metaphysics?
linkedContent: how did difference as perdurance (Austrag) remain concealed in the history of metaphysics?

content: perdurance of that which grounds & is grounded not only holds the 2 apart [Being & beings], holds them facing each other, holds them in tension, so that Being grounds beings & beings ground Being (in their way) [Being needs being, tautology?]

content: re: difference, perdurance as a circling, circling of Being & beings around each other

content: metaphysics does not heed (achten) difference as difference, only what differs > what differs is Being of being in general, the highest [how does Heidegger escape this?]

content: onto-logic: think beings re: ground common to all beings > theo-logic: think beings re: highest being which accounts for everything
linkedContent: onto-logic: think beings re: ground common to all beings > theo-logic: think beings re: highest being which accounts for everything

content: origin of the difference can no longer be thought w/in scope of metaphysics [why keep origin? for Derrida differance deconstructs originariness]

content: [method] step back out of metaphysics into active essence of metaphysics: out of oblivion of difference as such into das Geschick der sich entziehenden Verbergung (destiny of the withdrawing concealment) des Austrags (of perdurance)

content: no one knows [concession, provisional] when/where/how step of thinking will become proper path & way (necessary in appropriation [why is proper necessary?]) > possibility of boundless development of metaphysical oblivion

content: [admitting possible limits of language] Western languages are languages of metaphysical thinking, open question whether marked permanently by onto-theo-logic, or whether there are other possibilities of utterance [differance], i.e. telling silence

content: little word “is” speaks everywhere in our language, tells of Being even where it doesn’t appear expressly [beings prior to Being? cf. Nietzsche’s put last first [lookup]], contains whole destiny of Being: “is” of Parmenides, Hegel’s speculation, dissolution of “is” in Nietzsche’s Will to Power
